| History                 = 
===Early life===
The Holden Radcliffe Corporation was founded by [[Holden Radcliffe (Earth-616)|Holden Radcliffe]]. He was obsessed with developing androids as combat soldiers. {{r|Machine Teen #1}}

===A.D.A.M.===
He hired [[Aaron Isaacs (Earth-616)|Dr. Aaron Isaacs]], a pioneer in the field of robotics,  created the "[[Autonomosly Decislve Automated Meachanism]]". But when he discovered Holdenhad destroyed his work, Isaacs went on the run. He changed his name to Isaac Aaronson and built [[Autonomously Decisive Automated Mechanism (Earth-616)|Adam]], a beta version of his A.I. project.{{r|Machine Teen #1|2}} 

===Machine Teen===
He searched for years and it was until Adam himself found out he was a robot and his friend told a local policeman called Officer Michaels. He contacted Holden, revealing Michaels worked for Dr. Aaronson's former employer, Holden Radcliffe.{{r|Machine Teen #2}} Holden sent a team to kidnap Dr. Aaronson was interrogated by Office Michaels. The Holden Radcliffe Corporation was bent on getting their stolen property back. He used Adam's friend Carly unknowingly capture Adam, leading Office Michaels to Adam and J.T. and they are all captured.{{r|Machine Teen #3|4}}

Adam and his friends were brought to a building where Dr. Isaacs was kept. Adam was taken away and strapped to a table, where Holden tried to hack into Adam and take control of him; however, they could not. Adam escaped from Holden's, along with his father and friends, by tricking them in to thinking he is under their control. During the escape, Adam is nearly destroyed and has to delay Radcliffe to let his father and friends escape. Dr. Aaronson escapes with Adam's computer core, which set off a self-destruct sequence. Adam exploded, and Holden and Michaels are killed in the explosion..{{r|Machine Teen #5}}
